CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Coal?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Coal is arc {Geothermal}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Hydropower?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Hydropower is arc {Solar}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Geothermal to Coal in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Oil to Hydropower in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Coal to Hydropower in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Oil and Solar in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Oil and Solar is {226}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Geothermal and Coal in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Geothermal and Coal is {69}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Coal?
SC.A: The total flow output from Coal is {251}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Geothermal?
SC.A: The total flow input by Geothermal is {230}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 218? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {226} from {Oil} to {Solar}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 90? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {85} from {Coal} to {Geothermal}, a flow of {69} from {Geothermal} to {Coal}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 136 and 162? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {158} from {Hydropower} to {Coal}, a flow of {145} from {Hydropower} to {Geothermal}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Hydropower to Coal or from Hydropower to Oil?
NC.A: The flow from {Hydropower} to {Oil} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Oil to Solar, from Coal to Geothermal, or from Solar to Oil?
NC.A: The flow from {Oil} to {Solar} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Coal}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Oil} and {Solar}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Geothermal, Arc Hydropower, Arc Coal, Arc Oil, Arc Solar}.
